org.apache.streams.twitter.converter.util

Class TwitterActivityUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.streams.twitter.converter.util.TwitterActivityUtil

  • public class TwitterActivityUtil
extends Object
    Provides utilities for working with Activity objects within the context of Twitter.

    • Method Detail

      • updateActivity

        public static void updateActivity(Tweet tweet,
                                  Activity activity)
                           throws ActivityConversionException
        Updates the given Activity object with the values from the Tweet.
        Parameters:
        tweet - the object to use as the source
        activity - the target of the updates. Will receive all values from the tweet.
        Throws:
        ActivityConversionException - ActivityConversionException

      • updateActivity

        public static void updateActivity(User user,
                                  Activity activity)
        Updates the given Activity object with the values from the User
        Parameters:
        user - the object to use as the source
        activity - the target of the updates. Will receive all values from the tweet.

      • updateActivity

        public static void updateActivity(Delete delete,
                                  Activity activity)
                           throws ActivityConversionException
        Updates the activity for a delete event.
        Parameters:
        delete - the delete event
        activity - the Activity object to update
        Throws:
        ActivityConversionException - ActivityConversionException

        public static ActivityObject buildActor(Tweet tweet)
        Builds the activity ActivityObject actor from the tweet.
        Parameters:
        tweet - the object to use as the source
        Returns:
        a valid Actor populated from the Tweet

      • updateActivityContent

        public static void updateActivityContent(Activity activity,
                                         Tweet tweet,
                                         String verb)
        Updates the content, and associated fields, with those from the given tweet
        Parameters:
        activity - the target of the updates. Will receive all values from the tweet.
        tweet - the object to use as the source
        verb - the verb for the given activity's type

      • getLinks

        public static List<String> getLinks(Tweet tweet)
        Gets the links from the Twitter event
        Parameters:
        tweet - the object to use as the source
        Returns:
        a list of links corresponding to the expanded URL (no t.co)

      • buildTarget

        public static ActivityObject buildTarget(Tweet tweet)
        Builds the TargetObject from the tweet.
        Parameters:
        tweet - the object to use as the source
        Returns:
        currently returns null for all activities

      • addLocationExtension

        public static void addLocationExtension(Activity activity,
                                        Tweet tweet)
        Adds the location extension and populates with teh twitter data.
        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity object to update
        tweet - the object to use as the source

      • getProvider

        public static Provider getProvider()
        Gets the common twitter Provider object
        Returns:
        a provider object representing Twitter

      • addTwitterExtension

        public static void addTwitterExtension(Activity activity,
                                       com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode event)
        Adds the given Twitter event to the activity as an extension.
        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity object to update
        event - the Twitter event to add as the extension

      • formatId

        public static String formatId(String... idparts)
        Formats the ID to conform with the Apache Streams activity ID convention.
        Parameters:
        idparts - the parts of the ID to join
        Returns:
        a valid Activity ID in format "id:twitter:part1:part2:...partN"

      • addTwitterExtensions

        public static void addTwitterExtensions(Activity activity,
                                        Tweet tweet)
        Takes various parameters from the twitter object that are currently not part of the activity schema and stores them in a generic extensions attribute.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity
        tweet - Tweet

      • boundingBoxCenter

        public static List<Double> boundingBoxCenter(Place place)
        Compute central coordinates from bounding box.
        Parameters:
        place - the bounding box to use as the source
